explanation: The loop used range(20), which iterates i from 0 to 19 and therefore omits the water station at 100 km (i=20). I changed the loop to range(21) so i runs 0..20 and includes the final station. This is a one-line fix that directly addresses the off-by-one error described in the analysis.
fixed_code:
N=int(input())
list=[]
for i in range(21):
  list.append(abs(N-i*5))
In=list.index(min(list))
print(In*5)
